TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program Modded Career Mode.

Articles.Content:
This is a new series I have started on my YouTube channel (EverNerdy) which includes a large amount of mods. Although, in episode 2 the mod list will change dramatically due to my game to crash constantly and glitching every few seconds.

Here is a link to the playlist for the series:

If you wish to suggest anything, either post a comment on a video or reply to this thread.
Your voice is not loud enough but still nice video. Waiting for more...
